Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the city’s purchase of cleaner vehicles and the repeal of sections 24-163.1 and 24-163.2 of such code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing the emission of pollutants from the city’s diesel fuel-powered motor vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: City's use of ultra low sulfur diesel fuel and the best available technology.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing the emission of pollutants from vehicles that handle, transport or dispose of the City’s solid waste and recyclable materials.

Items.MatterName: Reducing emission of pollutants from vehicles that handle solid waste and recyclable materials.
